verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עֲלָמ֥וֹת <S%H5961><s%> upon Alamoth שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> A Song אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God לָ֭נוּ מַחֲסֶ֣ה <S%H4268><s%> [is] our refuge וָעֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> and strength עֶזְרָ֥ה <S%H5833><s%> help בְ֝צָר֗וֹת <S%H6869><s%> in trouble נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> present מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> a very

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> we will not נִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Therefore will not we fear בְּהָמִ֣יר <S%H4171><s%> be removed אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> though the earth וּבְמ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> be carried הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> and though the mountains בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> into the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

יֶהֱמ֣וּ <S%H1993><s%> thereof roar יֶחְמְר֣וּ <S%H2560><s%> [and] be troubled מֵימָ֑יו <S%H4325><s%> [Though] the waters יִֽרְעֲשֽׁוּ־ <S%H7493><s%> shake הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> [though] the mountains בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ <S%H1346><s%> with the swelling סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> thereof Selah

נָהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> [There is] a river פְּלָגָ֗יו <S%H6388><s%> the streams יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> whereof shall make glad עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> the city אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <S%H6918><s%> the holy מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י <S%H4908><s%> [place] of the tabernacles עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> of the most High

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ <S%H7130><s%> [is] in the midst בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> of her she shall not be moved יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ <S%H5826><s%> shall help אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God לִפְנ֥וֹת <S%H6437><s%> her [and that] right בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> early

הָמ֣וּ <S%H1993><s%> raged ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> The heathen מָ֣טוּ <S%H4131><s%> were moved מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdoms נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> he uttered בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice תָּמ֥וּג <S%H4127><s%> melted אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <S%H4869><s%> [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

לְֽכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Come חֲ֭זוּ <S%H2372><s%> behold מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <S%H4659><s%> the works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Who שָׂ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> he hath made שַׁמּ֣וֹת <S%H8047><s%> what desolations בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

מַשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> to cease מִלְחָמוֹת֮ <S%H4421><s%> He maketh wars עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵ֪ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the end הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bow יְ֭שַׁבֵּר <S%H7665><s%> he breaketh וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <S%H7112><s%> in sunder חֲנִ֑ית <S%H2595><s%> the spear עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת <S%H5699><s%> the chariot יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> he burneth בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> in the fire

הַרְפּ֣וּ <S%H7503><s%> Be still וּ֭דְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> and know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I am אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> that I [am] God אָר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> I will be exalted בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen אָר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> I will be exalted בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <S%H4869><s%> [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
